Preterit.turoyo: 1) maḥrawle i=niyayḏeʕal i=kačke 283; 88/244; k-ubʕeno d-qaymitu m-i=baxč-aṯediḏi m-u=sabab d-maḥrəwulxu; 24/168 [MT]
2) zex, šqulḥaq d-i=qabaḥayḏəx m-awo d-maḥráwle-ləx 285; prs 180/22, 27; 3) maḥrawlaabre d-u=paša b-u=ʕărāq 285; prs 12/11;

Preterit-wa.turoyo: 1) l-aṭ=Ṭayemaḥərwó-wa-lle w-moqáḏ-wa-lle ab=bot-ayḏa, w-qṭí-wa-lle u=ʕamo d-i=qriṯokule 284; 33/63; [MT]

Infectum.turoyo: 1) alomaḥrubayte d-u=malko 284; 73/340; bdele k-moḥetaḥt-ad=dawm-anək d-i=baxča, k-ḥofər u=ʕafro w-k-maḥru as=siġone ‘’; 24/162 [MT]g-maḥru u=šuro w-g-maḥru an=nuqroṯolə=k-ṭoremede b-i=arʕodə-ʕwədlehiye w-u=sowoeba
translations: ‘He destroyed the wall and the holes. He did not leave anything on the field where he and the old man worked’ 75/184;

Imperativ.turoyo: 1) kṯaw-lankṯawto d-ḥarše, aḥrúʕaqəl d-barṯo d-u=qarrān d-aš=šəšwone l-u=malko d-ad=dədwone 284; prs 171/32;
